phrs.translation: 入侵, 进入, 袭击, 攻击
黑暗入侵, 黑暗降临
跑道入侵, 跑道侵入
蜀黍大战僵尸, 僵尸入侵
入侵这件事, 入侵的事
开始了第一次的大侵袭

sentences.sentence: I also went to Gaza before the last Israeli incursion a couple of years ago.
sentences.translation: 几年前，以色列最后一次入侵加沙之前我到过那里。

sentences.sentence: The big incursion of the state into finance took place on his Republican predecessor’s watch.
sentences.translation: 国家大规模侵入经济发生在他的共和党前任治下。

sentences.sentence: The two younger girls, alarmed at this incursion of an Indian stranger had gone off to stay with a relative.
sentences.translation: 他们的两个小女儿，因为害怕一个陌生的印度人的侵袭，已经躲到亲戚家去住了。
